Hero.subtitle: THE ABSOLUTE TECHNO MOVEMENT
Hero.text: Mallorca — Where the ego dissolves and only the rhythm remains.

Manifesto.subtitle: Our Philosophy
Manifesto.title: THE MANIFESTO
Manifesto.m1_t: MØRK IS NOT JUST A PARTY
Manifesto.m1_d: It is a statement. An unwavering commitment to sound as truth.
Manifesto.m2_d: We create a space where the body remembers how to listen. A shelter for those who understand music not as background, but as the center.
Manifesto.m3_d: We curate nights for those who recognize intention in repetition and depth in darkness. Here, rhythm does not distract: it reveals.
Manifesto.m4_d: The dancefloor has no hierarchies or characters, only synchronized pulses. In darkness, we find unity. In repetition, transcendence.
Manifesto.m5_d: It is presence, not spectacle. Faceless community. When the light vanishes, sound takes control. And there, MØRK begins.
Manifesto.r1_d: We are here to dance. Music unites us, do not disturb those around you.
Manifesto.r2_d: No means NO. Consent is mandatory. Do not touch without permission.
Manifesto.r3_d: Enjoy the moment. Our staff will capture the event. Flash-free dancefloor.
Manifesto.r4_d: Good vibes or the door. Bring your best self.
Manifesto.r5_d: All bodies, genders, and styles are welcome. Here we all dance.
Manifesto.r6_d: If you see something off, tell the staff. We are here to help.

Team.subtitle: THE FAMILY
Team.title: THE TEAM
Team.text: We are a family that believed in the project from the very start. Techno and club culture are not trends to us, but a way of life.

Sound.subtitle: Listen
Sound.title: THE SOUND
Sound.text: Immerse yourself in the MØRK sound. Play directly here.

Artists.quote: “Between the mechanical and the animal, techno beats as the sound of life.”

Footer.text: Underground electronic music culture in Mallorca. Pure techno, pure experience.
Footer.pure_mork: WE ARE TECHNO, WE ARE MØRK.
